lines: THERE COMES TO MY HEART ONE SWEET STRAIN
1. Ku Nghena Mbilwini Yanga (Yanga), Ntsako Lowo Hlamarisa (Risa);
Ndza Dzunisa Kambe Na Kambe, Nyiko Yo Huma Kakwe.
Ku Rhula Nyiko, Yo Huma Tilweni; I Ya Rirhandzu Ra Yesu, Ya Hlamarisa.
2. Ku Rhula Ku Ta Na Yesu (Yesu), U Fe Matshan’weni Yanga (Yanga);
Mhamba Leyi Kutsulaka, Vutomi Byi Nga Herik’.
3. Loko Ndzi N’wi Amukela (Kela), Leswaku I Hosi Yanga (Yanga);
U Ndzi Nyike Rifuwo, Ndzamukele Ku Rhula.
4. Hosini Ku Tshama Ku Rhula (Rhula), Ndzi Ta Namarhela Yena (Yena)
A Ndzi Naveri Swin’wana, Handle Ka Ko Ku Rhula.
